meanings.definition: A daytime or early afternoon showing of a movie or theatrical performance.
meanings.sent1: We went to the matinee to watch the new movie during the day.
meanings.sent2: The matinee of the play was perfect for families with young children.
meanings.sent3: The matinee crowd enjoyed the show under the bright sun.
meanings.sent4: Attending the matinee felt like stepping into a different world for a few hours.
meanings.sent5: The matinee experience was filled with laughter and excitement.

meanings.definition: An afternoon performance or event, typically held on weekends.
meanings.sent1: The community center hosted a matinee for local musicians on Saturday afternoon.
meanings.sent2: The matinee at the park was a great way to spend a leisurely weekend day.
meanings.sent3: The matinee event featured a surprise guest that delighted everyone.
meanings.sent4: The matinee performance was a bright spot in an otherwise ordinary weekend.
meanings.sent5: Attending the matinee made the weekend feel special and memorable.
